subject: Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Paddy O’Prado, the third-place finisher in the 2010 Kentucky Derby and the winner of the Dixie Stakes on the Preakness card Saturday, was retired with a right leg injury.
snippet: Paddy O’Prado, the third-place finisher in the 2010 Kentucky Derby and the winner of the Dixie Stakes on the Preakness card Saturday, was retired with a right leg injury.
